instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'colors' and 'visual_enhancers' defined above. Use the specific hex codes.
2. FONT SETUP: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css and set the font families.
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Customize Shadcn components (Button, Card, Input) to match the 'Big & Chunky' accessible style. Increase padding and border-radius significantly.
4. LAYOUT: Use the 'Tetris' grid (Mode A) for the dashboard, but keep it simple. Avoid dense grids.
5. ACCESSIBILITY: Implement the 'TTS' (Text-to-Speech) helper component that can be dropped into any page to read content.
6. TONE: Keep all copy simple, encouraging, and jargon-free. Use 'Co-Designer' and 'Facilitator' terminology.
7. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs for the landing page and backgrounds. Apply the noise texture to the body background for a 'paper' feel.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
